title: Airline discontinues, US Airways' final flight
text:
US Airways began its final flight on Friday at 10:36 a.m.
The journey is named Flight 1939, a reference to the airline's founding year.
>> Read more trending stories
Photo credit: Getty Images US Airways The flight departed from Philadelphia International Airport headed for San Francisco.
It will make scheduled stops in Charlotte, Phoenix and San Francisco before returning as a red-eye flight back to Philadelphia on Saturday.
All future flights will fly under the American Airlines banner, following the completion of a merger announced in 2013.
US Airways was formed in Pittsburgh as All American Aviation. It later operated as Allegheny Airlines before becoming US Airways.
